name: Agile (Skysurfer_Kon)
description:
DO YOU LIKE RUNNING, JUMPING AND DYING?!!?

Yes you do.

Well then.. *cough* sadist *cough* (just kidding) ...you can try Agile!

AGILE is a game where you can run to different places and collect crystals. The more crystals you get, the more abilities you can unlock!  

CONTROLS:
  1. move left - A
  2. move right - D
  3. jump - SPACE
  4. Pause game - ESCAPE

    To walljump, hold space while dropping off the wall. You can hold space to keep jumping.

This is my first game of many to come in the future.

Feel free to report bugs, feedback or suggestions in the comments!
